Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip (partly worn); interior: reserved band at rim,glazed streaky black below; added white band of chequers between white lines; below, frieze of alternating added red and reserved buds with white outline; white and red circles in interstices; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion (part of mane, back and thigh remaining) to right.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1999) (phase 2)
